p: MDCK London line cells (International Reagent Resource, #FR-58) were cultivated in Alpha MEM (Biolot) supplemented with 2 mM L-glutamine and 10% “SC-biol” FBS (Biolot). A549 cells were cultivated in DMEM/F12 (Gibco) media supplemented with 2% GlutaMAX (Gibco) and 10% FBS (Gibco). Vero cells (ATCC, #CCL-81) were adapted to serum-free medium and cultivated in OptiPro SFM (Gibco) supplemented with 2% GlutaMAX (Gibco).
